```{r}
library(openxlsx)
```

```{r}
tabs <- list(
  "STable1_lncTDMD"=readRDS("../Figures/Figure_5/suppTable_lncTDMD.rds"),
  "STable2_circTDMD"=readRDS("../Figures/Figure_5/suppTable_circTDMD.rds"),
  "STable3_circSlicing"=readRDS("../Figures/Figure_5/suppTable_circSlicing.rds"),
  "STable4_circSponges"=readRDS("../Figures/Figure_6/supp_table_sponges.rds")
)
```

```{r}
write.xlsx(tabs, file="SupplementaryTables1-4.xlsx", keepNA=TRUE, asTable=TRUE)
```
